rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer and coat closet, adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Spacious living area with traditional Chettinad style decor and central courtyard view.
A dedicated dining space adjacent to the kitchen, ensuring natural light from large windows as per Vastu guidelines.
Functional design with integrated storage, adhering to local norms, ensuring proper ventilation and fire safety measures.
Small utility area for guests, placed appropriately as per spatial planning standards.

openings.description: Large foyer entrance with natural light and security features.
Stylish windows in the living room and dining area to allow ample ventilation and sunlight, compliant with building norms.

rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom with private balcony overlooking the central courtyard.
Comfortable second bedroom with ample storage and traditional Chettinad aesthetics.
Additional bedroom designed for guest use or children, maintaining uniform style and Vastu compliance.
Well-appointed bathroom attached to the master bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort.

openings.description: Private balcony for the master bedroom, providing outdoor space and fresh air.
Large windows in bedrooms for natural light and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Dedicated study area or additional bedroom, ensuring quiet and focus as per local norms.
Includes a utility room and storage space for household supplies, designed in line with building regulations.

openings.description: Shared balcony adjoining the study room and service area, enhancing light and ventilation.
Access point to the rooftop terrace designed for social gatherings and relaxation.
Natural lighting feature integrated into the design for energy efficiency.
